description: This is an example Group. You can add more fields to sync if you would like.
This is another example. Add more groups if you you would like.
The data needs to match the field names as defined in the xMatters REST API.
If the field names or values don't match what the rest API requires you.
will need to alter them. This can be done before loading the data
with userUploadToImport or after using the groupTransform sync option.
